plays.text: Penalty to Chris McAllister 2 minutes for Roughing Igor Larionov
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Kirk Maltby

Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Rob Blake and Martin Skoula
Penalty to Patrick Boileau 2 minutes for Holding Peter Forsberg
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Serge Aubin
Penalty to Serge Aubin 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Sean Avery
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Patrick Roy
